Name: Incandescence
Description: Weapon's final ATK is increased by 15% at the start of battle. No duration limit.

Name: Dead Point Countdown
Description: Gain 1 additional Signal Orb at the start of battle, and 3 identical Signal Orbs every 45s.

Name: Matrix Lightning
Description: After EX Dodge, Movement Speed is greatly increased and all enemies' Extra DMG Reduction is decreased by 10% in Matrix.

Name: Incandescence
Description: Weapon's final ATK is increased by 15% at the start of battle. No duration limit.

Name: Dead Point Countdown
Description: Gain 1 additional Signal Orb at the start of battle, and 3 identical Signal Orbs every 45s.

Name: Matrix Lightning
Description: After EX Dodge, Movement Speed is greatly increased and all enemies' Extra DMG Reduction is decreased by 10% in Matrix.

Name: Matrix Outburst
Description: All DMG increases by 15% when in Matrix.

Name: Overload Signal
Description: An Entrance Skill grants 1 additional Signal Orb. Extra DMG Bonus of Signal Orb Skills increases by 10% for 8s.

Name: Limit Break
Description: All ATK increases by 10%.

Name: Matrix Outburst
Description: All DMG increases by 15% when in Matrix.

Name: Overload Signal
Description: An Entrance Skill grants 1 additional Signal Orb. Extra DMG Bonus of Signal Orb Skills increases by 10% for 8s.

Name: Limit Break
Description: All ATK increases by 10%.

Name: Resonance Vibration
Description: Physical DMG increased by 15% when combo is greater than 50.

Name: Saturated Loading
Description: Pinging all 3 types of Signal Orbs within 5s increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Dodge Echo
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Predator's Maxim
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20% when attacking enemies in a burning area.

Name: Cycle of Stars
Description: Increases Skill - Space Lord's Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. Physical DMG is increased by 15% for 5s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Measurement Theory
Description: When picking up an Energy Ball, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. For every 5 Energy Balls picked up, gains an additional random Signal Orb and 10 Energy. 10s cooldown.

Name: Unbranded Slash
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of Red Orb skills increases by 15%.

Name: Phantom Sword
Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to call down a lightning strike that deals 50% Physical DMG. 3s cooldown.

Name: One With Armor
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Blade of Fury
Description: Basic Attack DMG increases by 10%. Physical DMG increases by 5% for 2s after each Basic Attack. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Inverse Shadow
Description: Lightning DMG Bonus increases by 5% for 4s when dealing Lightning DMG. Can be stacked up to 4 times. Signature Move increases own Extra DMG Bonus by 10% for 10s. Both duration will reset every time it is triggered.

Name: Energy Incarnate
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5%. Pinging orbs will accumulate energy based on the number of orbs pinged. Consumes 50 energy to summon Sirius for 45s. 60s cooldown.          Its power as a weapon is nothing to write home about, but it is much sought after for its attractive appearance.

Name: Falling Blossoms
Description: For each orb pinged, Physical DMG increases by 2% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Gains an extra Swordwave Orb in Swordwave Mode. 10s cooldown.

Name: Crimson Snow
Description: Ice DMG increased by 15%. After a 3-Ping, All DMG is increased by 10% for 5s.

Name: Bramble Heart
Description: Dark DMG increases by 15%. Attacks have a 15% chance to unleash a shadow wave, dealing 75% Dark DMG. 0.5s cooldown.

Name: Deep Pursuit
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Chain Combo
Description: Gains 1 random Signal Orb every 30 combos. 8s cooldown.

Name: Jet Boost
Description: ATK increased by 20% for 4s after an EX Dodge. Gain 1 Signal Orb when the effect ends.

Name: Original Number
Description: Laser Shot's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 50%. Gains 15% ATK after a 3-Ping for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Ring of Praise
Description: For every 12 orbs pinged, increases Extra DMG Bonus of the allies within 5m by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. When attacking Imprisoned enemies, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Storm Hunt
Description: Basic Attacks have a 10% chance to inflict Frail, reducing the target's ATK by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Attacking a Frail enemy has a 10% chance to restore 1 Signal Orb. 6s cooldown.

Name: Concentrated Neutralization
Description: Physical DMG increased by 15% if you attack the same target for 5s.

Name: Sharpshooter
Description: CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG increased by 10% if there are no enemies within 2m.

Name: New Moon
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Now, I Am the Master
Description: Signature Move's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. Signature Move reduces its target's Physical Resistance by 2% for 5s per hit. Can be stacked up to 8 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Raging Tempest
Description: Lightning DMG is increased by 15%. When dealing Lightning DMG caused by skills to the same target 5 times, calls down a lightning strike that deals 150% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown.

Name: Shed Excess
Description: Physical DMG increased by 10% for 3s when switching targets.

Name: Echo Halls
Description: Attacks have a 30% chance to inflict Broken Armor, reducing an enemy's DEF by 5% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Chain of Stars
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Fusion Shadow
Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to inflict Breach, dealing 2% Physical DMG per second for 3s. The chance is doubled if the enemy's DEF has been reduced. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Physical DMG increases by 10% when attacking a Breached enemy.

Name: Fire Chain
Description: Attacks have a 10% chance to reduce the target's Fire Resistance by 5% for 5s. 8s cooldown against the same target. A Signature Move increases Fire DMG by 20% and doubles the chance of reducing the target's Resistance.

Name: Precision Suppression
Description: The first Basic Attack hit on a target is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit. 15s cooldown against the same target.

Name: Variable Arms
Description: Attacks have a 10% chance to unleash a shockwave, dealing 100% Physical DMG to enemies in the area.

Name: One With Armor
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Unified Will
Description: Physical DMG increases by 15%. Upon a successful parry, Extra DMG Bonus of the next skill increases by 30%.

Name: Shadow Burst
Description: After a 3-Ping, Physical DMG and Dark DMG dealt increase by 20% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Broken Helix
Description: Basic Attack DMG increased by 10%.

Name: Unquenchable
Description: ATK increases by 12% for 4s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Light Firecrackers
Description: When Artillery Tactics or Thermal Armament is active, dealing damage causes a firecracker explosion at the target location, inflicting a total of 250% Physical DMG. 10s cooldown.

Name: Chaos Particle
Description: Physical DMG increases by 10%. After a 3-Ping, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Raging Red
Description: Fire DMG increases by 10%. Pinging Red Orbs increases Fire DMG by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Silent Hunter
Description: Movement Speed is increased by 30% and ATK is increased by 10% for 3s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Heart of Gravel
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15% for 5s after performing a 3-Ping consecutively. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Fallen Yuanxiao
Description: Dealing DMG has a 20% chance to release a Yuanxiao that deals 15% Physical DMG. 1s cooldown.

Name: Zero Pierce
Description: Dealing a Critical Hit from behind inflicts Breach, dealing 50% Physical DMG per second for 3s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Physical DMG increases by 20% when attacking a Breached enemy.

Name: Soul Strike
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Dark DMG increases by 10% while under Cosmic Wave state.

Name: Color of Bleakness
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 7% when attacking enemies with Super Armor.

Name: Line Drawing
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10% for 4s when performing a QTE or 3-Ping skill. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Color Splash
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 2% for 5s when dealing DMG to enemies with Super Armor. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Stuns an enemy for 2s when breaking its Super Armor. 10s cooldown for the same target. Physical DMG increases by 15% for 7s when releasing Vector Cube. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: St. Elmo's Fire
Description: Lightning DMG increases by 10%. No. of Lightning Strikes required to trigger Core Passive reduced to 3 under "Signature - Lightning Charge".

Name: Photophage Phantom
Description: Basic Attack DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Rageful Abyss
Description: After a 3-Ping, Extra DMG Bonus is increased by 12% for 4s.

Name: Solar Cleave
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. When Camu: Crocotta enters Berserk, Thanatos will continuously increase Dark DMG for characters on the battlefield by 10%.
